description: A hwIpMcastDownstreamChannelLimit notification signifies that an entry belongs to
specified channel has been limited.
This notification is generated whenever an entry belongs to specified channel
failed to add downstream cause channel downstream entry or bandwidth limit.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwIpMcastDownstreamChannelLimit HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwIpMcastChannelSource a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwIpMcastChannelGroup a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwIpMcastChannelInterfaceIfIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwIpMcastChannelName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwIpMcastChannelDownstreamEntries u 9999 HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwIpMcastChannelDownstreamBandWidth s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwIpMcastChannelInterfaceName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwIpMcastInstanceName s EXAMPLE

description: A hwIpMcastOutChannelExceededLimit notification signifies that existed entries
exceeded channel downstream entry or bandwidth limit of pim routing-table.
This notification is generated whenever existed entries belongs to specified
channel exceeded downstream entry or bandwidth limit due to downstream
limit configuration.

event.Summary: Entries exceeded channel $v1 downstream limit of $v5

description: A hwMFIBEntryOverloadSuspend notification signifies that the MFIB module is overloaded.
This notification is generated whenever the MFIB module is overloaded in the board.

event.Summary: MFIB module overloaded, forwarding suspended on board $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwMFIBEntryOverloadSuspend HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwIpMcastOverloadAddressType i 9999 HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwIpMcastInstanceName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwBoardIndex i 9999

description: The OverloadAddressType of the trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwIpMcastOverloadAddressType

description: The instance name of the trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwIpMcastInstanceName

description: The BoardIndex of the trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwBoardIndex

description: A hwMFIBEntryOverloadSusResume notification signifies that the board MFIB module changes
from the overload suspension state to the normal state.
This notification is generated whenever the MFIB module changes from the overload suspension
state to the normal state.

event.Summary: MFIB module recovered from overload suspension

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwMFIBEntryOverloadSusResume HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwIpMcastOverloadAddressType i 9999 HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwIpMcastInstanceName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwBoardIndex i 9999

description: The BoardIndex of the trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwBoardIndex

description: A hwIpMcastSGThresholdExceed notification signifies that multicast routing (S, G) entries count of all instances reached the upper threshold.

description: The total number of multicast routing (S, G) entries of all instances.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPMCAST-MIB::hwIpMcastSGTotalCount
